search_general_talk_specialcos02/4401_07:
Your first objective is to make it through this
pitch-dark cave.

You may not be assisted by your partner Pokémon.
Instead, please choose the most appropriate
partner from the ones right here.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4402_07: I am here to provide what little assistance I can.

If you’re curious about any of these partners,
I can tell you a bit about them.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4403_07: Ah, Mudkip. The Mud Fish Pokémon.

The fin on its head acts as a radar, sensing
movements of air and water, so Mudkip can get a
grasp of its surroundings without using its eyes.
Would you like to choose this Pokémon?
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4404_07: This is Litwick, the Candle Pokémon.

It’s said that Litwick’s light absorbs the life energy
of people and Pokémon and burns it up.
Would you like to choose this Pokémon?
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4405_07: This is the Fox Pokémon Braixen.

When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets
the twig alight. It’s said that this flame is used to
send signals to Braixen’s allies.
Would you like to choose this Pokémon?
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4406_07:
Be it summer or winter, it makes no difference to
this swimmer, who always wears his swimsuit.

He’d like you to take particular note of his
trapezius and pectoral muscles.
Would you like to choose this person?
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4407_11:
When Mudkip entered the darkness, it lifted up the
fin on its head and began walking
confidently forward.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4407_07: W-wait! Where did you go, Mudkip?

Oh, I think it’s crying out to guide us! Let’s 
follow the sound of its cry!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4407_11:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie followed the
sound of Mudkip’s cries and made it safely through
the cave!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4408_11:
When Litwick entered the darkness, its flame
started burning brightly.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4408_07: Watching that light is making me feel kinda dizzy...

I’m pretty sure I’ve heard that Litwick’s light sucks
out the life energy of people and Pokémon...

Oh... Oh no! We need to turn back!
Hurry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4408_11:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie rushed back
out of the cave...
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4409_11:
When Braixen entered the darkness, it pulled the
twig from its tail and set it alight.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4409_07: Oh, now we can see where we’re going!

Huh?! Look, the water near that fire over there
looks perfect for swimming!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4409_11: The splash put out the flame on Braixen’s twig!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie had no
choice but to turn back...
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4410_07:
When the swimmer entered the darkness, he
immediately started freaking out.

I can’t see anything at all! It’s so dark, it doesn’t
even matter if I’m wearing a swimsuit or not!

For all you know right now, I might be wearing
shorts like a youngster or a miniskirt like a lass!

What’s the point of being a swimmer anyway?!
Am I...no more than my swimsuit?!

The swimmer sprinted back out of the cave with
incredible speed.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4411_07: My Nosepass can help with the puzzle solving!

If you’re lost, just take a look at the direction
Nosepass’s nose is pointing.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4412_07:
If you’re lost, just take a look at the direction
Nosepass’s nose is pointing.

Nosepass’s nose is highly magnetic and is always
pointing in a certain direction.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4413_07:
Do you think Nosepass will show us which way
to go?
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4414_11: It’s holding a note that says, “Go north.”
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4416_07:
Oh, it’s Accelgor! Which must mean this is the
right way!

And it’s gone... It looks like we’ve still got a long
way to go, too.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4417_11:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie ran back the
way they’d come!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4418_07: There’s another fork in the path.

Let’s look carefully at Nosepass’s nose before we
decide which way to go!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4419_11: It’s holding a note that says, “Go east.”
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4420_07:
Apparently, its nose isn’t always facing the path
we want to take.
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4421_04:
It looks like this way is blocked by some
boulders...

Oh, actually, I think we can break these boulders
pretty easily!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4422_07: Oh, it’s Escavalier! We did it! This is the right way!

Oh, it left, too... But I’m sure we must be
almost there!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4423_07: It looks like there’s only one way to go here!

We must be nearly at our goal
now, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4424_11: It’s holding a note that says, “Go south.”
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4425_07: It looks like just one way to go!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4427_04:
Based on what we’ve seen so far, Nosepass’s
nose seems to always be pointing north.

Wait, what? That would mean that the correct
path is...
Huh? You want to go back the way we came?

If you say so! I believe in
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4428_07: Oh, look! It’s Accelgor and Escavalier!
So turning back was the correct choice?
Perfect! Now we can get through!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4429_07:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie ran back the
way they’d come!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4430_07: Guess which one is the Antique Form Polteageist!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4431_07: Guess which one is the Antique Form Polteageist!

Here’s a hint: there’s one particular characteristic
somewhere that only Antique Form Polteageist has!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4433_01: You think this is the Antique Form Polteageist?
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4433_04: You’re sure it’s this one? The answer is...
No rush! Take all the time you need to think!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4434_07:
Too bad... You guessed wrong. Try again and
really look closely!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4435_07:
Great! You’re totally right! Those are some keen
eyes you’ve got!

You’ve solved every one of our puzzles! Well
done, both of you!
search_general_talk_specialcos02/4436_11:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie ran back the
way they’d come!
